channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole and area around is on a bend and is getting a lot of traffic from residents and businesses, 21st November
item.description:
On a bend in our road opposite no 3 Faringdon Road The area around is also very badly worn

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Faringdon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive slurry and mud on track, 21st November
item.description:
There is an excessive amount of slurry and mud all over the track from Zoons Court Farmhouse down to the dual carriageway. It is a popular walk for many people but in its current state it is barely passable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Cabinet Graffiti, 21st November
item.description:
A green street cabinet at the junction of Hollis Road and Hatherley Road has been vandalised with graffiti. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 363, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10 feet of tarmac at the entrance to No 14 was lifted by the deluge and traffic is making it worse., 21st November
item.description:
Across the entrance to 14 Greenhills Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Potholes poor road surface, 21st November
item.description:
Potholes poor road surface. I think the team have repaired some of the shocking road surface but lots of damage remains. Why didn't they repair all of it?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 21st November
item.description:
Customer reporting that a number of streetlights have been out of action for last 2 weeks - customer stated she reported this 2 weeks ago (no trace of original enquiry).
Report on FixMyStreet
